chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d0 d1 : DTA, dta_compatible d0 d1 -> DTA_compat d0 d1

Premises:
DTA_compat = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => dta_compat p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
dta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => predta_compatible p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
OrdersTac.ord_ind : forall P : OrdersTac.ord -> Prop, P OrdersTac.OEQ -> P OrdersTac.OLT -> P OrdersTac.OLE -> forall o : OrdersTac.ord, P o
N.central_induction : forall A : N -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : N, A z -> (forall n : N, A n <-> A (N.succ n)) -> forall n : N, A n
Pos.peano_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, P 1%positive -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (Pos.succ p)) -> forall p : positive, P p
Pos.peano_rect : forall P : positive -> Type, P 1%positive -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (Pos.succ p)) -> forall p : positive, P p
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
ssrbool.prop_in1 : forall T1 : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T1 -> forall P : T1 -> Prop, ssreflect.phantom Prop (forall x : T1, P x) -> Prop
Ring_polynom.Pphi : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> R
ssrbool.prop_on1 : forall T1 T2 T3 : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T2 -> forall (f : T1 -> T2) (Pf : (T1 -> T2) -> T3) (P : T1 -> Prop), ssreflect.phantom T3 (Pf f) -> ssreflect.phantom Prop (forall x : T1, P x) -> Prop
option_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : option A -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (Some a)) -> P None -> forall o : option A, P o
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
Z.bi_induction : forall P : Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq iff) P -> P 0%Z -> (forall x : Z, P x <-> P (Z.succ x)) -> forall z : Z, P z
pow_pos : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> R) -> R -> positive -> R
ssrfun.cancel : forall rT aT : Type, (aT -> rT) -> (rT -> aT) -> Prop
ssrbool.bijective_in : forall aT rT : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred aT -> (aT -> rT) -> Prop
List.hd : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> A
in_dom : forall A : Type, ad -> Map A -> bool
sumbool_ind : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
sumor_ind : forall (A : Type) (B : Prop) (P : A + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (inleft a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inright b)) -> forall s : A + {B}, P s
BinList.jump : forall A : Type, positive -> list A -> list A
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A

```coq
intros d0 d1 H.
induction d0 using DTA_rect.
intros a.
induction d1 using DTA_rect.
intros a0.
simpl in H.
simpl.
unfold DTA_compat.
rewrite <- H.
reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros d0 d1 H. induction d0 using DTA_rect. intros a. induction d1 using DTA_rect. intros a0. simpl in H. simpl. unfold DTA_compat. rewrite <- H. reflexivity.
